label: Sinai Greek NF M 48, Undertext (Greek minuscule, Greek majuscule)

note: Informal minuscule, upright or sloping to the right, with numerous abbreviations. The liturgical rubrics are written in a small “Alexandrinische Auszeichnungs-Majuskel”

note.value: According to the sequence of the text, it is possible to assume that the bifolios 24-25 and 22-27 belonged to the same quire
Description of undertext by Pasquale Orsini
